name: John Lemon's Haunted Jaunt (Party Boi)
description: The creak of a nearby floorboard alerts the creeping ghosts. You, a courageous exlplorer who goes by the name 'John Lemon', is left with the task of exiting a haunted mansion. Can you help safely guide our citrusy explorer through the halls of the Haunted Jaunt? Or will the ghosts and gargoyles get to John and catch him in middle of his escape? Find out on John Lemon's Haunted Jaunt.
